title: IDebugSystemObjects4::GetTotalNumberThreadsAndProcesses (dbgeng.h)
description: The IDebugSystemObjects4::GetTotalNumberThreadsAndProcesses method returns the number of threads and processes in all the targets the engine is attached to.
